channel.title: Zsh on mb's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Zsh on mb's blog

item.title: Oh My Zsh Bootstrap, A Small Oh My Zsh Plugin Manager
item.description: I started a small but helpful project oh-my-zsh-bootstrap to maintain my oh-my-zsh. Oh My Zsh Bootstrap is plugin for Oh My Zsh which provides commands to maintain your plugins and themes enable_plugin disable_plugin download_plugin update_plugin enable_theme download_theme update_theme You can install Oh My Zsh Bootstrap with a onliner curl -L https://github.com/mbauhardt/oh-my-zsh-bootstrap/raw/master/tools/install.zsh | zsh
